title: Crazy 2v5 on jinx (yummi) on my smurf!!!!!

embed.description: some late game destruction on jinx ;p

body: nice lil 2v5 with some good mechanics ;p thoughts?

replies.body:
Congratulations, you successfully ruined a low-elo game.

And by "ruined" I don't mean "performed well in." I mean you made that game bad, with an unfair matchup. It's little better than a low-elo player playing on a friend's high-elo account.

to be fair, im doing 2 things in these games. A. Getting a old friend gold ;p B. practicing jinx adc because i main support but want to slowly transition into adc so this allows me to practice my mechanics witch in this case were pretty clean ;p
bro u need to take some notes u cancel 90 autos u move like an ape plz leave adc to the professionals
hey man im only plat 4, but im trying my best to get better at the role, tips would be greatly appreciated! :)
Kinda sad that your friend can't get gold by himself and needs you to smurf...

> [{quoted}](name=maoYABAA,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=5YqcJvXh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-07-20T08:30:56.006+0000)
>
> to be fair, im doing 2 things in these games. A. Getting a old friend gold ;p B. practicing jinx adc because i main support but want to slowly transition into adc so this allows me to practice my mechanics witch in this case were pretty clean ;p

Those are reasons, not justifications.
